data.expected_result: A small "Filter" popup message should appear like it does in Recent Mentions when long pressing the filter button
data.short_description: [Resubmitting with pictures for better clarity] Long pressing the filter button in the *Quick Switcher* doesnt make the small "Filter" text appear like it does in *Recent Mentions*
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the quick switcher - Long press the filter button at the top right (three stripes)
